ComicInfo.Title: The Sorcerer Pope Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
Kicking off the ongoing adventures of comics’ favorite pulp heroine! Athena races against the Nazis to find an artifact once possessed by Pope Sylvester II, but the allies helping her have their own agendas. Loyalties will be tested. With absolute power up for grabs, who can you trust?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Steve Bryant | 1 | B | Retro Variant Cover | Steve Bryant | 2 | C | Variant Cover | Tom Fowler & Jason Millet | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-28 09:53:02. [CVDB659924]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jason Millet, Steve Bryant, Tom Fowler
ComicInfo.Characters: Athena Voltaire, Baron Siegfried von Sturm, Desmond Forsyth, Helmut Jaeger, Liam Peters, Marjorie Mordido, Pippa Nightengale, Rolf Hassencamp
